Recommendations: The psychometrician is an important personnel of the university. In order for her to function more efficiently/effectively, an assistant may be assigned by the University.

There is a need to revise existing manuals and other info materials, as well as alumni checklist and directories. This is necessary in order to disseminate the latest information about the program and for easy retrieval or references about the alumni.
Database on drop-out rates may be installed.
The active involvement of the alumni should be trapped by the Dean and the students. The alumni could provide strong support in terms of funding and information base for the students.
Researches on the employment and demand analysis for graduates can be initiated by the combined efforts of students, with the guidance of the Dean and the members of the faculty.

Constant dialogues among the Dean, the faculty and the students may be initiated in order to foster and build up open lines of communication among them, thereby identifying worthy projects and activities for the program and the College.
